Frequently Asked Questions:

1. Do you guys offer custom plans?
-If you need more space and bandwidth, or perhaps less space and bandwidth because you are on a tight budget, we will be happy to give you a quote. Just contact our sales department with your needs. Submit a ticket through JunaWeb.com OR Email us at sales@junaweb.com

2. What are your different forms of contact?
-You can contact us through our ticket system or Live chat through JunaWeb.com. You may also call us at (347) 565-JUNA and leave a message. We also offer AIM and MSN support. Find more details here: Contacting Juna Web - Please note that we cannot provide any billing info or refunds through Live Chat, Phone, or Instant Messenger. You must submit a ticket through our Ticket System.

3. Do you offer a money back guarantee?
-Yes we do. There is a 30 Day Money Back guarantee for Shared hosting accounts, 15 day money back guarantee for Reseller and Shoutcast accounts, and a 7 day money back guarantee on VPS Hosting Accounts.

4. Where is your Terms of Service Located?
-Please read our TOS at the following url: Terms of Service

5. What methods can I use to pay Juna Web?
-We accept three major forms of Payments. We accept All payments through PayPal, AlertPay, and Google Checkout. If you have to pay with a credit or debit card, you can do it through either of the three without a problem. No account is required with PayPal or Google Checkout for CC payments.

6. Where are your servers located?
-Our main servers are located in Seattle, Washington, United States. We soon hope to expand to all over the country and go internationally into Canada and parts of Europe.

7. My question hasn't been answered.
-If you still have questions, please feel free to contact our sales department through a ticket at JunaWeb.com or Email us at sales@junaweb.com any time.
